product_name: Seattle Sports Diamond Fire USB Taillight
long_description: Featuring a USB rechargeable battery, the Seattle Sports Diamond Fire USB Taillight offers a quick-mounting design and bright LEDs to alert motorists and other cyclists to your presence.
short_description: Featuring a USB rechargeable battery, the Seattle Sports Diamond Fire USB Taillight offers a quick-mounting design and bright LEDs to alert motorists and other cyclists to your presence.
